availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Bridges (Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, tobacconist )

body.p: Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, tobacconist. Kentucky native. Married to Armilda Bridges. Father of Katy Bridges, Laura Bridges, Delle Bridges, and Martha Bridges. Tobacconist in Covington, Kentucky in 1850. Tobacconist in Covington, Kentucky in 1860. Statement given in trial of the Commonwealth of Kentucky V. Daniel W. Clark in January 1861.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, p. 573. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, p. 764. KYR-0001-021-0014.
